website_summaries.verdict: If you want an outdoor fan and don't mind the higher price, this powerful machine is a great choice. It's also indoor-rated, but due to noise, it may be impractical for indoors.
pros: A sturdy, stylish fan that stands out for its indoor and outdoor versatility
Heavy, adjustable base and strong air output
cons: Some owners have reported that it's too noisy to use indoors
it's loud even on the low setting

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this fan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this fan. It's beautiful and it blows really strong. Very easy to assemble. Highly recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: EKH

customer_reviews.title: A bit loud
customer_reviews.text: Fully extended the fan is 51 inches tall. It comes with a cover and the oscillating feature covers about 90 degrees. It moves a good amount of air even on low speed. I wish it had a lower speed so it wouldn't make so much noise. The attached video was shot with my phone from 10 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan bought for my deck to keep mosquitos away. Looks beautiful and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not Indoor Fan
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful heavy fan but it is NOT an indoor fan like advertised... it is loud and blows a ln extremely heavy wind. Not for a bedroom while you sleep. I assumed when advertised as Indoor/Outdoor it would be conducive to inside.
customer_reviews.author: copgirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these fans i have purchased, in different styles. They are expensive, but look good and are sturdy and heavy. It's difficult to find an outdoor fan that doesn't look like it belongs in a construction site. The breeze feels great and keeps mosquitos away. I can't speak to ease of assembly, because I paid someone to do it for me. He did complete the assembly fairly quickly. I generally find the lowest setting to be enough breeze. I don't think the fan is unusually loud.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noisy at all speeds & Poor assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: I would actually give this 2 1/2 stars if 1/2 star is possible. This is very noisy at all speeds and the assembly instructions didn't match the product, so I had to take time to figure it out. It oscillates fine, but the up & down adjustment doesn't hold no matter how tight it's screwed, so it always points down. I like the safety of the GFI, but be aware that it makes the plug very large, so we had to remove our outdoor outlet cover box in order to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: flyingoverfences

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive fan. It is a little difficult to put together, but once it is done, it looks great. The fan is quite heavy. It works GREAT. It is a little noisy, but nothing you can't get used to. The cool air it puts out is wonderful. I used to use two regular fans at the same time in my bedroom, but this fan takes the place of both of the regular fans. Would definitely recommend this fan. I use it specifically in my bedroom. Would not want to waste it for outside use. A bit expense, but well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J L Wells

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fan !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely; took about 30 minutes to assemble; fairly easy to do; it is a bit weighty so gust of wing won't topple it; I am using it as outside fan; yes, it is a bit loud even on the lowest setting but that does not bother me...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy DecoBreeze products!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered fan June 2017. Used it 4 times then it quit. The fan says DecoBreeze on the front of it but the paperwork that was sent with it was for a Lasko fan. I tried to use the fan today but it won't work. Motor just hums. I called Customer Service listed on the Lasko paperwork. They were prompt on answering and were very polite and helpful. Because it is a DecoBreeze fan and not a Lasko, they couldn't help. Why was Lasko information sent with a DecoBreeze fan????? I will not purchase another DecoBreeze product!! I know Costco handles Lasko and I've always had good luck with Costco products. I'd try a Lasko but not DecoBreeze!!!! I'm out $159.
customer_reviews.author: pat bald

customer_reviews.title: BIGGER THAN A BREADBOX
customer_reviews.text: This is a big fan, but sturdy and considering it's size, relatively quiet. We haven't tried anything but the lowest speed however because for the size of the room, that is all that's necessary. This reviewer is in Ventura, CA, and in theory, being on the ocean it's never sweltering. Wrong- this last 4 weeks have been warm and muggy and the fan, if nothing else, keeps the air moving until the evening cool down. The design is nice, if you like Pineapples- meaning it's not just a pole with blades. If there's a downside, it's size makes it awkward to move around, but it's fine as a stationary one-room tool.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. I can't speak to ease of assembly, because I paid someone to do it for me. However, the fan is great. It provides a good breeze and is successfully chasing away mosquitos. The fan also looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cheesy.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheesy fan for $200. It s actually quite tacky looking but by the time I got all of the pieces out of the box and unwrapped, I didn't think I could repack it to send it back. Finish is a bronze color with brush strokes and the fan blade is a copper color. I is also very noisy. Save your money...
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Check motor before assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive fan, love the look. Live in a very hot summer climate in Central Calif. The fan listed as 3 speed which was a great selling feature. I have 3 speeds however all are high! A lot of force in the area I use it in. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Debby L. Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking easy to assemble. I still give 5 stars even though I can only use on low because it has some amazing power and any higher it can be loud and windy. Was hoping I could also use indoors but to much power for me inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made, good quality, attractive in any decor!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really pretty! White finish, old fashioned looking which is what I was looking for. At first it was a little difficult to put together as the instructions are for another style fan but once I studied it, it was fairly easy to put together with just a screwdriver. I haven't turned it on yet as I have to get an electrician to look at my outside plug but it should be fine. Overall, very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mary perry

customer_reviews.title: The fan itself looks great, was easy to assemble and seems to work ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan itself looks great, was easy to assemble and seems to work good.. We will see more if we every get a spring day. I was a bit disappointed in the height of the fan. I have been use to fans being 5'-6' high. This one is barely over 4'. The height was listed but I didn't pay attention to it. It will definitely do what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Fan itself moves the air. I had to build ...
customer_reviews.text: Fan itself moves the air. I had to build a spacer to assemble the stand as it did not tighten down. Very cheaply made for a fan that cost this much. Would NOT buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks nicer online than in person. It seems overpriced to me and we will have to wait to see how it holds up outside here in Miami. If I had seen this on the shelf or floor at a store I probably would have not bought it. Its a fan and moves air what more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: AbeScot

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but its Heavy sturdy beautiful powerful easy to assemble had it done in 20 min no tools required working great got the pineapple design has 3 year warranty and a nice bag to cover it if you choose to store. Noise level it is perhaps louder han other fans but noise doesnt bother me
customer_reviews.author: AMJD

customer_reviews.title: Good looking fan  that sounds like an airplane
customer_reviews.text: We had been wanting a fan in our bedroom and had looked last summer at pedastal fans and they were more than we really wanted to spend. I was searching for something entirely different on the web and this pedestal fan popped up for only $199 !!! I ordered it shipping was free and it was here in two days! We had to assemble it which was a little bit challenging not too bad. It looks great in our room. But it sounds like a airplane! It may take awhile to get used to the sound. It may end up on our patio, I guess that is why it is an indoor/outdoor fan.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very good fan.
customer_reviews.text: Love how the fan looks and cools. It is really great. We have one just like it in Florida where we spend the winter. It was out in our back yard in Key West last year when the hurricane hit. The only damage the fan sustained was the loss of one of the small knobs which controls the fan speed. Design Air replaced it promptly. Very good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Brookemeister

customer_reviews.title: this is a great looking product but was a bit of a stretch ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great looking product but was a bit of a stretch for me to assemble but after several hours and tiny screws I succeeded ...and when I plugged it in it worked great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly cools a 12x18 room with a high ceiling.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I didn't listen to the some of the reviews and gave it a chance. Looks great, works great. (even my GF liked the looks of it!)Whisper quiet may be a stretch. To me it is no more quiet or louder than any other fan that pushes this much wind. Simple to put together even with the wrong directions.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley J.

customer_reviews.title: Outside fan that looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks really attractive. Not much noise even at full speed. Easy to put together except for on really tiny nut and bolt. Extends to nice height.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cunliffe

customer_reviews.title: GREAT customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in July 2019. When I tried to use it in July 2020, it no longer oscillated. I contacted the seller, via Amazon, and they were amazing!!! Decobreeze customer service was so responsive. They helped me trouble shoot and when that did not work, sent me a replacement part with no hassle. I would buy another product from them because their customer service is OUTSTANDING, especially Britney.
customer_reviews.author: Carol C.

customer_reviews.title: Creates high winds!
customer_reviews.text: Living in southern Texas, we need airflow in order to be able to stay outside most of the year. I bought this as a Father’s Day present for my husband and it’s working out fine. It is stylish, sturdy and is so strong that high speed feels like tornado winds! My only complaint is that the base arrived with a dent in it but otherwise it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kcuret

customer_reviews.title: It's quite loud
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking fan, but much too noisy for my taste. I wanted a stylish fan for my bedroom, but realized too late that this is meant to be used outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: urashton

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately a dissapointment .
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 5 months. Fan cuts off when motor seems to get too hot/ then comes back on. Doesn't seem safe. Tried to contact company and no response- must not stand behind their product. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year of little to no use
customer_reviews.text: This thing definitely is not designed for outdoor use. I left it on a covered patio for a year. We used it maybe 4 or 5 times in that entire year. Now it won't start. Unplugging, resetting the breaker, nothing. This is not worth the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L

customer_reviews.title: Trash don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Just put it in the trash aster a few uses. Very cheap made. The thread on all adjusting screws was stripped shortly after bought. Today the motor starter to make cracking noise so it became a safety issue.don’t buy this looks really nice but it is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor fan
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for in an outdoor fan. I have a 16'x16' deck that's covered, but still needed air movement to make it tolerable to use when the SE Texas humidity sets in. This fan fits the bill! Note- it does NOT have a mister and the plug has a large black box attached to it. The plug does NOT fit into a standard outdoor outlet container. I have to connect the plug to my outlet via extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: abefroui

customer_reviews.title: Cools and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, nicer looking than every other fan I looked at and it delivers a great amount of air circulation. I wish it had a remote, but it's not a big deal. And the fan is a little loud, but for cooling me off on these hot summer days when I'm out on my patio it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L Drake

customer_reviews.title: Inconvenient reset button
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, sturdy...but it has a "reset" button on the plug ( which I assume is a safety feature), and every time the fan is turned off, you must hit the reset to start it again! So I have to move my couch every time to get to the reset button! And I already have it on an extension cord- but still can't reach the reset without a lot of inconvenience. And not something I want to do if I have company over. So it's pretty useless to me, in the area I needed it for...
customer_reviews.author: cindy defino

customer_reviews.title: No directions and some products were missing
customer_reviews.text: The directions that came with the fan were for the wrong product. It also did not come with the optional water mister. My husband has already put the fan together without any directions so I won’t be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Ebf

customer_reviews.title: OVER PRICED
customer_reviews.text: Liked the Most: Has GFCI Operation Liked the Least: Was expecting better quality and cooling for the price. OVER PRICED which I attribute to the decorate base. Noisy and heavy due to the base. It would be best to shop for a fan at a place where you can actually compare the fan's features hands on and test them out.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Made of good material and built well
customer_reviews.text: Made of good material and built well. Fan blade is a little noisy, but does move air really well. Recommend if looking for a outdoor patio fan. Comes with cheap plastic cover considering this is a high quality fan. I guess they have to save some extra pennies somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fan quit working after less than 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Just got the fan delivered, today. Put it all together. Moved it outside, because i live in the south, and its hot. Plugged in the fan, and within 2 hours, it completely quit. Cant reset the plug. Nothing. Just. Dead. $200 down the toilet!! DO. NOT. BUY.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The product came as described and was easily assembled. However to our surprise two were delivered
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fan after our Hunter antique fan finally died after 14 years of service. The product came as described and was easily assembled.However to our surprise two were delivered. But Amazon customer service was very nice and made it very easy to return; and UPS promptly picked it up. I am hoping this fan will give us many years of blissful patio breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kleamenakis

customer_reviews.title: Dead after only 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that after 3 years fan is now dead. Base on the cost I expected for this fan to be long lasting but here we are $189.00 for 3 years of service. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!
customer_reviews.text: We are using this outside and it is great to keep the mosquitos away and cool us down in the heat. It is a little noisy, but not annoyingly so. I like how heavy it is so it doesn’t blow over. I’d buy another one if I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: The fan has adequate power, a little noisey but ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan has adequate power, a little noisey but I'm using it on a deck so there are no issues there. After seeing the fan I think it is a little overpriced, I'm certain one of the plastic molded ones would work as well at half the price, it just won't be as astheticaly pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: $125 per month and then Bad
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted only 2 month's. The nicest most expensive fan I have ever had and only 2 month's without being able to return? Very upset!
customer_reviews.author: DC 202

customer_reviews.title: Poor information.
customer_reviews.text: This product requires a handyman to put together. The details do not indicate that it comes in 10 pieces. I am not a handyman and wanted this to be simple to handle and put together. Not in 10 pieces. Poor information.
customer_reviews.author: miriecho

customer_reviews.title: What? I can't hear you!
customer_reviews.text: This looks very very nice. It is so loud. Like airplane loud. They do not want you to return it. You are paying for its elegance not its engineering. I wanted both.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Derton

customer_reviews.title: Great outside fan
customer_reviews.text: We are very how the fan operates and the strong air currents that it produces. We use it outside all the time we sit at our patio.
customer_reviews.author: john in sc

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Returned item. Screws did not fit so we were unable to put fan together. Also, felt flimsy overall. We really liked the style, but poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: FAN COVER
customer_reviews.text: The fan works great, however, the cover has ripped many times and would like to purchase another cover if possible. Bought the fan last May. I hope the manufacturer will get back to me.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: too loud
customer_reviews.text: This too is very nice looking, but much louder than I thought it would be. I am using these fans inside and they are very powerful and also very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: urashton

customer_reviews.title: beautiful, sturdy fan but very loud
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this fan!! Very powerful, sturdy, great design with lots of air flow, however, I returned it because it was too loud. I was looking for a more quiet running fan. But I would highly recommend this product if noise level is not as issue.
customer_reviews.author: Rogenia

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this fan beautiful, it puts out tons of air and it is not noisy! I've had several outdoor parties this summer, and at least a half a dozen people have asked me where I found this treasure.
customer_reviews.author: G. Moerschel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Floor Fan !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan ! And it certainly blows a lot of air. I like to have a fan on year around to keep the air circulating . This will certainly do the trick . It's a bit loud , but nothing that won't be heard as white noise once you get accustomed to it. However, I experienced a bit of difficulty assembling the fan, the written instructions that were included were difficult to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J. Sciba

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete package, no poles so had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Could not even put this fan together as the manufacturer failed to include the upper and lower poles in the box. Had to return. Most disappointed as it looks nice, but for the price I expected everything to be in the box. Not going to risk ordering another one. Will buy a fan locally to ensure all parts are included.
customer_reviews.author: Mojorisin

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive fan
customer_reviews.text: I am using the fan or my front porch since the porch ceiling cannot support ceiling fans, I chose the fan becuase of its ornate style.
customer_reviews.author: Valeri L. Jacoutot

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The fan is great on our deck/gazebo. Puts out a lot of air on low and can move to different spots. It has a cover, wish it was a little heavier and longer. Wish the cord was longer. We love it and is great for our hot summers
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Klein

customer_reviews.title: They dont show the cord and knobs in the add!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand why it came with a Black cord and Knobs??? Should have been white...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Powerful fan, perfect for my patio.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that this fan was flimsy but once I got it all out of the box and assembled, it was heavy enough. If your outlet has a cover the plug may not work without chiseling out the bottom of the cover or removing it. It blows very well even on low speed.
customer_reviews.author: kaycur

customer_reviews.title: This is a great fan I bought for my back porch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan I bought for my back porch. It was very easy to put together. I didn’t even have to look at the instructions. It’s very stable and functions great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Elaine Burton

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: It is important to note that this is an outdoor fan; therefore, it is a bit noisier than an indoor fan, but not by much. We bought this fan for our Lanai and are completely satisfied with our purchase! It looks good and moves the air so that we'll have many pleasant evenings throughout the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to deck
customer_reviews.text: Great wind speed! A little noisy but using outdoors doesn’t matter. Love the pineapple design.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Caine

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is what we needed for our lanai. It was easy to assemble. (the instructions were for another model, however it was still easy to assemble. It took less than 15 minutes to assemble. The fan is very nice looking and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Milton C.

customer_reviews.title: Good and adjustable air flow
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with purchase. Got this fan for my covered patio. Moves air around well. Really like that it is adjustable in height. Fairly quiet!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit oscillating the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: Worked for about 1 hr and quit oscillating. Save the box because you will probably be returning it. I returned mine.
customer_reviews.author: Happy 1

customer_reviews.title: Second season!
customer_reviews.text: Brought it out this spring and it works like a charm. Really moves the air!
customer_reviews.author: southernbugg

customer_reviews.title: water resistant even in Florida rainy season!
customer_reviews.text: great outdoor fan...blows the mosquitos away from out patio..love it
customer_reviews.author: aunt maim

customer_reviews.title: Best Porch Fan
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan! It was recommended by friends who have one on their front porch. We love to set on our porch, but the heat can make it unbearable. This fan has been a great solution. I have purchased other fans and returned them due to not having enough breeze. Problem solved with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The fan is beautiful and it fits in perfectly with my décor
customer_reviews.text: The fan is beautiful and it fits in perfectly with my décor. It runs silent, which I really appreciate. The perfect fan!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: This does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Its the only 18" decorator fan we could find. High quality construction, and the fan really moves air. My wife has night sweats so we needed a powerful fan for the bedroom. This does the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Reed W. Risteen

customer_reviews.title: THIS FAN IS AWESOME !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS FAN SO MUCH I WISH I COULD AFFORD ANOTHER, MAYBE SOME DAY. It looks so much better than the white one I replaced it with. Looks GREAT with the furniture and blends in well with my decor. And it was easy to assemble and that was a plus. I would recommend this to ANYONE. Thank you so much !!!! Toni
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use on a deck.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this fan to use on our deck and it’s perfect for that. It looks great. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and powerful
customer_reviews.text: This fan is really beautiful! The power of it is very impressive. I can't wait for summer so I can enjoy using this out on my screened porch!
customer_reviews.author: The Haynals

customer_reviews.title: Moves air and looks nice. Base holds lots of water.
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok. Fan works well but the stand holds water, is flimsy and the knobs started to strip almost immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Radio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! Only wish it was a little taller! It is beautiful and cools really great! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Janice Stevenson-Swink

customer_reviews.title: Oscillation NOT
customer_reviews.text: The fan worked fine for the first 2 weeks. Then it started making a clunking noise. Then the oscillation stopped and appeared to be stuck in one position. I could make it move by hand, but then it rotated back to the stuck position and stayed there.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H. Cary

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: works well. nice upgraded look for a living room or such
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and arrived quickly, works great outdoors, makes the summers more comfortable to sit outside.
customer_reviews.author: R. Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Just received it and we are very pleased. Works perfectly on our deck.
customer_reviews.author: Janice White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan, pricey but glad I purchased it. Works perfect on my patio!
customer_reviews.author: jackfxy

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking fan,strong air movement. It went together easily. Only issue is the fan angle adjustment I can't tighten and fan points down a bit. Otherwise great and I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: erice

customer_reviews.title: Did not last very long
customer_reviews.text: Fan does a great job of moving air . Fan very nice finish and detail . Fan would not oscillate after a few months . This was very premature considering the price of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: jerry frank harris

customer_reviews.title: The oscillation and wind produced is perfect for inside or outside
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy, as you should expect any high volume fan to be. The oscillation and wind produced is perfect for inside or outside. Well built, easy to assemble the few pieces, and decorative. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: CIBB4479

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be waterproof. It's been outside on deck, under overhang, for 3 months and stopped working. Plug fuse wont reset. Not a good buy for the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan brechenser

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: After about 12 uses the fan has stopped working. Out of the window to return. Should Not have bought online. Could have returned for an exchange at a big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Jack1752

customer_reviews.title: It looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great !!! I have not had a chance to use it on a hot day but I have used it on a warm day and it’s great !!! I did think it was going to be bigger and bit more stable.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Quit oscillating
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this fan. I bought it because we needed something that could withstand the misters on our patio. While the fan is still working, it quit oscillating less than 2 months after I received it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda J. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan looks great easy to put together an awesome outdoor fan 👍🏻❤️
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lormand

customer_reviews.title: this unit would cool about a 6 foot section of our
customer_reviews.text: sorry we sent the product back. for some reason we thought the blades would be bigger. this unit would cool about a 6 foot section of our deck
customer_reviews.author: C Moran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellant fan perfect highth when sitting outdoors. Fan is smooth and quite.
customer_reviews.author: james b daw

customer_reviews.title: It is not whisper quiet like the description says it is
customer_reviews.text: The fan is attractive but very loud. It is not whisper quiet like the description says it is. The motor is quiet but the blade design makes it too loud even outdoors. It prevents normal conversation while it is running even on the lowest speed.
customer_reviews.author: raleighNC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Exactly what we need for our hot summers. Easy to put together also!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Everett

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged
customer_reviews.text: For $200, I would expect the product to not be damaged. There are two dents in the base. Because of the size and trying to repackage it, trying to return the item would be a huge hassle.
customer_reviews.author: ANHowland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: The fan is very noisy, the lowest setting is more like high. The fan is beautiful, but way too noisy.

customer_reviews.title: I love this fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It is perfect for where I want it. The stand is strong and a great height. It is also decorative. A little more expensive than I wanted to pay, but, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L. Matsen

customer_reviews.title: great little attractive fan
customer_reviews.text: great little attractive fan. looks great on patio,well built and nice exterior finish. very effective on patio and complements the ceiling fan well.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Murray

customer_reviews.title: A little noisy
customer_reviews.text: So far this fan is great-looks great, works great but it’s a little noisy

product_meta.title: Designer Aire Oscillating Indoor Outdoor Standing Floor Fan for Cooling Your Area Fast - 3-Speeds, Adjustable 40-51 Inches in Height, Fits Your Home Decor
product_meta.description:
BEAT THE HEAT IN STYLE

This vintage fan is sleek and quiet. The timeless design adds flare and style to any room of the house. With three speeds, the 45 watt motor will keep you cool and comfortable. Bask in a comfortable, cooler room at a fraction of the cost of an air conditioner, or use the pedestal fan to help keep consistent air flow through your bedroom, living room, family room, office, gym, garage, or patio. 

GREAT ADDITION TO ANY ROOM

This stand up fan has an adjustable telescoping neck that allows you to adjust it between 40-51 inches tall for the perfect height across your bed, desk, sofa, or patio. The oscillating fan reaches a wide area across your room, office, gym, garage, bedroom, or kitchen. A tilting head allows you to control exactly where the cool air goes with a strong, direct wind or a softer, indirect breeze. 

STYLISH AND ELEGANT

Made with high-quality stainless steel covered with an elegant finish. The fan's sleek design can enhance the look of any space. This room fan has a 45-watt motor with 3 speeds. Choose between the LOW setting at 900 RMP, the MEDIUM setting at 1100 RPM, or the HIGH at 1280 RMP. The smooth oscillating feature guarantees you'll remain comfortable even during the hottest days and nights. 

OUTDOOR FAN FEATURES:


A weighted base to provide stability during windy conditions U/V-resistant all-weather paint to eliminate fading ELT “Wet Listed” safety rating with GFCI plug 18 inch fan head with oscillating and tilt features Adjustable telescopic neck
feature_bullets: ADJUSTABLE AND FLEXIBLE OSCILLATING FAN: Telescoping neck allows you to adjust the fan height anywhere from 40-51 inches high. Oscillating fan head is 18” wide and tilts so you can cover a wide room for maximum cooling.
PACKS A PUNCH: 3 adjustable speeds and a 45-watt motor packs a punch for cooling your area fast. Low setting is 900 rpm, Medium is 1100 rpm, and High is 1280 rpm. The fan head measures 18 inches.
FOR INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE: Coated in All-Weather, U/V paint for outdoor use. Wet-listed safety rating, with GFCI plug. Weighted base for extra stability against bumps.

OPTIMUM PERFORMANCE AND UNMATCHED ELEGANCE: This premier oscillating fan is constructed with high-quality brushed stainless steel. Sleek and shiny stainless steel construction with a timeless and elegant finish.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: You deserve the best, so if you are unsatisfied for any reason simply let us know and we'll make it right!
